original_text: While Jehu was destroying Ahab's family, he met some of the officers of Judah who had come with Ahaziah. Jehu killed them, as well as some of Ahaziah's relatives who had travelled with him.
korean_text: 예후로 하여금 아합의 집을 심판하게 하실 때에 유다 방백들과 아하시야의 형제들의 아들들 곧 아하시야를 섬기는 자들을 만나서 죽였고

sentences.original_text: While Jehu was destroying Ahab's family
he met some of the officers of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유다의 관원 몇 사람을 만났습니다

sentences.original_text: as well as some of Ahaziah's relatives
